  • Constructor Details

    • Crack

      public Crack​(Brick brick, int crackDepth, int steps)
      Crack constructor to create a new geometric path in a brick based on parameters
      Parameters:
      brick - the brick object
      crackDepth - the value of the depth of the crack
      steps - the number of steps to be taken when generating a crack

  • Method Details

    • makeCrack

      protected void makeCrack​(java.awt.geom.Point2D point, int direction)
      Generates a visible crack on the brick object based on the parameters
      Parameters:
      point - the X and Y coordinats of the starting point of the crack
      direction - the direction the crack is generated at

    • makeCrack

      protected void makeCrack​(java.awt.Point start, java.awt.Point end)
      Generates a visible crack on the brick based on the parameters
      Parameters:
      start - the starting point of the crack
      end - the ending point of the crack
